text: Ezɨ Apsalom uan buaramizim Tamarɨn garima, an aziavɨra izima, a an azara, “Manmaghɨn ami? Nɨn tuebam Amnon nɨ ko akua arazitamɨn nɨ gamizɨ nɨ azia izi? Amnon, a nɨn tuebam, kamaghɨn, nɨ azir akam ategh pura uabɨ amɨragh mɨghɨgh bizir a nɨ gamizir kamɨn osɨman markɨ. Egh nɨn tuebam Amnon nɨ gamizir arazir kurar kamɨn gun gumazitam mɨkɨman markɨ.” Ezɨ Tamar Apsalomɨn dɨpenimɨn ghugha a ko iti, ezɨ osɨmtɨzir kam zurarama anebɨravɨra iti.
